tool_description: NCVT Certificate is a certificate awarded for the completion of ITI courses under the purview of the NCVT. The full form of NCVT is the National Council of Vocational Training. Exams conducted by the NCVT include Craftsman Training Scheme (CTS), Apprentice Training Scheme (ATS), and All India Trade Test (AITT).
title: India NCVT ITI Cerificate Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: India NCVT ITI Cerificate Verification
api_list.description:
NCVT Certificate is a certificate awarded for the completion of ITI courses under the purview of the NCVT. The full form of NCVT is the National Council of Vocational Training. Exams conducted by the NCVT include Craftsman Training Scheme (CTS), Apprentice Training Scheme (ATS), and All India Trade Test (AITT).

Use GET call in the bundle, to obtain result of request id received in response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-ncvt-iti-cerificate-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ncvt_iti"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-ncvt-iti-cerificate-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
